<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2799</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">My Pen Pal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mein Brieffreund</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mon Correspondant</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Minha Pena Pal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La Mia Penna Pal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η πέννα μου PAL</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Mi Amigacho De Pluma</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A lesson plan for an activity where students write a short letter to a pen pal. Includes an assessment Rubric and actual examples.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">letters</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">language</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">grammer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">assessment</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ein Lektionplan für eine Aktivität, in der 
Kursteilnehmer einen kurzen Brief zu einem Brieffreund schreiben. 
Schließt eine Einschätzung Rubrik und tatsächlichen Beispiele
ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un plan de leçon pour une activité où les 
étudiants écrivent une lettre courte à un correspondant. 
Inclut une rubrique d'évaluation et des exemples réels.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma planta da lição para uma atividade onde os 
estudantes escrevam uma letra curta a uma pena pal. Inclui um 
rubric da avaliação e uns exemplos reais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un programma di lezione per un'attività dove gli
allievi scrivono una lettera corta ad una penna pal. Include una
rubrica di valutazione e gli esempi reali.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένα σχέδιο μαθήματος για μια δραστηριότητα όπου οι 
σπουδαστές γράφουν μια σύντομη επιστολή σε μια πέννα PAL. 
Περιλαμβάνει μια ρουμπρίκα αξιολόγησης και πραγματικά 
παραδείγματα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un plan de la lección para una actividad donde 
los estudiantes escriben una letra corta a un amigacho de pluma. 
Incluye una rúbrica del gravamen y ejemplos reales.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
